###Data

library(foreign)

###Viz
```{r, viz, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(INC1, fill = HAPPY)) +
  geom_bar() +
  facet_grid(~GENDER1) +
  labs(x = "primary income", y = "frequency", fill = "reported happiness")


```
